description.value:
When set via a Tech-Use Test, has perception 75, on detecting intruders a loud alarm sounds heard out to a kilometre (varies on doors, walls, etc). Poor: Only Detects Loud Noises or Fast Movements, Good: Detects Specific Sounds, Movements, and/or odours, and have more subtle warnings (such as scream via vox)

Effect: Average / Initiated

Notes: 140 T 5 R
